articles.title: Latest On Production Resumption at Apple, Tesla Supplier's Shanghai Plants
articles.content:
With the COVID-19 situation in Shanghai improving, suppliers of U.S. big techs have gradually begun to ramp up production to pre-COVID levels.
Taiwan-based Quanta Computer, which manufactures about three-quarters of Apple, Inc.'s (NASDAQ: AAPL) MacBooks, has resumed production at its Shanghai facilities, noted analyst Ming-Chi Kuo  said. The analyst had previously noted that Quanta is the sole supplier of Apple's high-end MacBook Pros.
The company has eight factories in Shanghai, employing about 40,000 workers.
Related ...Full story available on Benzinga.com
